Title: Housetrap
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Dan Fybel
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: In true Belcher fashion, the family gets stuck in a terrible storm while up in Craggy Neck. The storm is the least of their worries, however, when they are forced to take shelter with the mysterious owner of a large beach home.
